name: Summer Roguelike Project - Week 1
description:
This is my entry for week 1 of Reddit's Summer Roguelike Tutorial.

Each week, I'll be using Construct 3 to complete the required steps and posting the results here. By the end, I should have a fully-fledged roguelike!

Since setting up a Construct project isn't too difficult, I was able to skip ahead a little bit. (I ended up adding in both dungeon generation and field of view).

If you have any feedback, feel free to leave it below! See you next week!
